name: Pushcat (itch)
description:
Hey, Who's That Purple Cat?Help Pushcat adventure through five exciting worlds in his quest for sweet, sweet silver. Along the way he'll get chased by angry ghosts, explore caves full of treacherous traps and even combine the best bits of science and magic.Features
  • Occasionally chaotic game design
  • Delightfully crisp pixel art
  • Over 50 procedurally generated caves
  • A chirpy 8-bit ragtime soundtrack
  • Slime and rainbows. Every game needs slime and rainbows, right?
Reviews

"... a brain-straining arcade masterpiece..."
5/5 – RGCD

"... chaotically busy (and sometimes sublime) level design..."
4/5 – The Indie Mine

"... a very well-polished design and some rather creative, outside-the-box puzzles..."
4/5 – Twinfinite
